main event: On October 4, 1962, a ground radar observation in Baldwin, North Dakota, reported a silver object that appeared to descend and then disappeared.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for about 5 minutes,The report was relayed through the Air Defense sector,No contact with anything was confirmed from the report,The report admitted nothing of substance was observed,The object was described as a silver object giving the impression of a larger object.
witness description: Radar observation with no confirmed visual witnesses
